rev.comment: no need to go into such details
rev.diff:
Line 38: Line 38:
ISO images are also unable to store multi-track disc images.
ISO images are also unable to store multi-track disc images.
â
As of the middle of February of 2011, moreover, no "portable" programs for the Windows OS were known to exist that were capable of mounting ISOs on a USB flash ("thumb") drive or of reading them from such a drive. It is believed that this was because mounting and/or reading ISOs in Windows NT and later, network-based, versions of Windows OS required a driver, which is inaccessible to users of these operating systems who lack administrative privileges.
+
As of February of 2011, moreover, no "portable" programs for the Windows OS were known to exist that were capable of mounting ISOs on a USB flash ("thumb") drive or of reading them from such a drive. It is believed that this was because mounting and/or reading ISOs in Windows NT and later, network-based, versions of Windows OS required a driver, which is inaccessible to users of these operating systems who lack administrative privileges.
